about_the_game:
Take your VR gaming to the next level with PEDAL REBEL VR!
Put your body into the action by strapping any VR controller to your leg, jump on any stationary bike and its time to ride.
Dodge oncoming traffic at breakneck speeds while boosting and stealing energy from other cars as you pass, gaining maximum speed and points.

Real Pedalling Action!

Strap, Tape, or Tie any VR motion controller to your leg, jump on any stationary bike and you are off and racing, no expensive sensors needed!
Go to to check out our recommended setups and optional accessories including some you can 3D print or make for free!

Get in the Zone!

With fast reaction gameplay so engrossing and addictive, it doesnt even feel like exercise!
The speed and thrill keeps you looking for the next speed booster, the next jump, the next unlock,
Put your reactions to the test while narrowly avoiding traffic to get maximum skill points.

Lean & Dodge

Steer your bike by leaning side to side, the faster you go the better the handling.
Dodge traffic and steal their energy to overcharge your bike, unlocking higher maximum speeds while increasing your score multiplier.

Features:

  • Immersive Gameplay: Transform your exercise bike and VR headset into the ultimate gaming setup, and become part of the action as you speed down the busy highways.
  • Dynamic Racing Experience: Dodge traffic and steal energy from passing vehicles, to go faster. Lean into turns as you ride through a variety of picturesque locations.
  • Guilt-Free Gaming: Enjoy a full gaming experience with an engaging story, compelling characters, and exciting unlocks, all while improving your fitness and health.
  • Dynamic Soundtrack: Feel the adrenaline rush as the dynamic electronic soundtrack responds to your speed, intensifying the action and pushing you to go faster.
  • Challenge Yourself: Earn score bonuses and take on challenging missions to unlock new levels and achievements, putting your skills to the test.

DEMO COMING SOON

Get a taste of whats to come with our upcoming demo!
Give us a wishlist and jump into the Discord to be the first to know when the demo drops.

Pedal Rebel VR - Demo Gameplay Trailer

name: Pedal Rebel VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR, Steam VR, Motion Controllers recommended,
  • Additional Notes: Best played with VR motion controllers, while riding an exercise/stationary bicycle.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR, Steam VR, Motion Controllers recommended,
  • Additional Notes: Best played with VR motion controllers, while riding an exercise/stationary bicycle.

reviews:
“Its Peloton for fun people!”
- SXSW Syd playtester

“Feels like the exercise bike was just waiting for the right game!”
- AVCON 2023 playtester

“Great way for kids to get their energy out!”
- SAGE 2024 playtester
short_description: GET YOUR ADRENALINE PUMPING! This cyberpunk street racing game transforms any exercise bike into an immersive VR SIMULATOR! Pedal, lean & dodge high speed traffic, listening to HEART PUMPING dynamic music that gets better the faster you go!
